title: What is story with the part of the Harold Wells building at 3rd and Market.  On top of the building on the north west part of the building there is another two stories with no windows.  My guess it is an extra floor where a safe is located?
text:
It looks to me like it houses part of the elevator system. As with
banks I've seen constructed, safes are usually in the interior of the
building and on lower floors.
